snippet: Gunmen suspected of being militants with Al Qaeda killed the Yemeni soldiers, an official said, as American Embassies across the Muslim and Arab world reopened after a terrorism threat.
abstract: Yemeni official says gunmen suspected of being militants with Al Qaeda have killed five Yemeni soldiers in southern province of country; attack comes as American Embassies across the Muslim and Arab world reopen after a terrorism threat emanating from the region.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen suspected of being militants with Al Qaeda killed the Yemeni soldiers, an official said, as American Embassies across the Muslim and Arab world reopened after a terrorism threat.
